title: Dirty Talk, Dealbreakers & Disappearing Dates
itunes:title: Dirty Talk, Dealbreakers & Disappearing Dates
itunes:subtitle: Dirty Talk, Dealbreakers and Disappearing Dates
description:
On tonight’s show, Emily answers your most pressing sex and relationship questions that you sent to Feedback@SexWithEmily.com. Topics include: how to rock the missionary position, the right lube for you, and what to do when the dirty talk gets too dirty. Emily and Anderson discuss a surprising fact on millennial dating, tell you what two qualities you need for a successful relationship and answer the question on everyone’s mind: Where do all the disappearing daters go?

Life is too short to have sex the same way, every day! Emily gives tips to help you mix things up and find your sweet spot, whether it be the G or otherwise.  This Podcast has advice to help you get the hell off your phone, and get the sex and relationships you deserve.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
